radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe, diffuse atrophy with frontal predominance and severe frontal lobe white matter attenuation.
Bifrontal atrophy and leukoariosis of the subcortical white matter.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Behavioral and cognitive deficits progressed; severe frontal atrophy and diffuse white matter degenerative changes were evident at death.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate subcortical white matter disease without ventriculomegaly or extensive atrophy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Gait and cognition continued to decline.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Profound white matter hypodensities capping the frontal horns.
